PackageOracle.name: DA_PROCESS_LOG_DETAIL
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_PROCESS_LOG_DETAIL
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.09.333669000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_bucket IN VARCHAR2
,audit_value IN NUMBER
,process_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_bucket IN VARCHAR2
,audit_value IN NUMBER
,process_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,process_log_detail_id IN NUMBER
,audit_bucket IN VARCHAR2
,audit_value IN NUMBER
,process_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,process_log_detail_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_process_log_detail;

body.name: DA_PROCESS_LOG_DETAIL
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_PROCESS_LOG_DETAIL
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.09.345100000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_bucket IN VARCHAR2
,audit_value IN NUMBER
,process_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_process_log_detail.add(fx), parms=' || audit_bucket || '|' || audit_value || '|' || process_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_process_log_detail a
(
a.process_log_detail_id
,a.audit_bucket
,a.audit_value
,a.process_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_process_log_detail_id.NEXTVAL
,add.audit_bucket
,add.audit_value
,add.process_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.process_log_detail_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_process_log_detail.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_bucket IN VARCHAR2
,audit_value IN NUMBER
,process_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_process_log_detail.add, parms=' || audit_bucket || '|' || audit_value || '|' || process_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_process_log_detail a
(
a.process_log_detail_id
,a.audit_bucket
,a.audit_value
,a.process_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_process_log_detail_id.NEXTVAL
,add.audit_bucket
,add.audit_value
,add.process_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_process_log_detail.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,process_log_detail_id IN NUMBER
,audit_bucket IN VARCHAR2
,audit_value IN NUMBER
,process_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_process_log_detail.add, parms=' || process_log_detail_id || '|' || audit_bucket || '|' || audit_value || '|' || process_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_process_log_detail a
(
a.process_log_detail_id
,a.audit_bucket
,a.audit_value
,a.process_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.process_log_detail_id
,add.audit_bucket
,add.audit_value
,add.process_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_process_log_detail.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,process_log_detail_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_process_log_detail.del, parms=' || process_log_detail_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_process_log_detail a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.process_log_detail_id = del.process_log_detail_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_process_log_detail.del');

END del;

END da_process_log_detail;
